SCTX - Script Source:
scriptName mwTRSothaLever09Script

;each lever gets a script that controls itself, and moves the door based on the door's
;local state (each door has LocalState script on it).
;sounds should be tagged in animations

short state		;the state of the lever, 0 down, 1 up
short move		;tells the lever and door to move


begin OnActivate
	if fbmwActSothaPreDoor9.IsAnimPlaying == 0
		set move to 1
	endif
end

begin gamemode
	if  ( move == 1 )

;animate the lever
		if ( state == 0 )
			PlayGroup forward 0
			set state to 1
		else
			PlayGroup backward 0
			set state to 0
		endif

;animate the door
		if (  fbmwTRSothaSil.SothaPredoor9state == 0 )

;push anims on to open
			fbmwActSothaPreDoor9.PlayGroup forward 0
			fbmwActSothaPreDoor9.Playsound 0SothaDoorOpen
			set  fbmwTRSothaSil.SothaPredoor9state to 1

		else	
;push anims on to close
			fbmwActSothaPreDoor9.PlayGroup backward 0
			fbmwActSothaPreDoor9.Playsound 0SothaDoorClose
			set  fbmwTRSothaSil.SothaPredoor9state to 0

		endif

		set move to 0

	endif

end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 935 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
